name: ext_R5_Permission
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Permission for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Permission from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Permission|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Permission resource holds access rules for a given data and context.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions.
